languages.text: "Потому что твоя хула застала меня врасплох. Обвинить меня в ереси и предательстве одним махом сразу же после того как ты предоложил{mf||а} мне участвовать в мятеже? Если я по твоим словам боюсь гибели, то ты ее явно ищешь!"

"Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really ask me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"
languages.original_text: "Потому что твоя хула застала меня врасплох. Обвинить меня в ереси и предательстве одним махом сразу же после того как ты предоложил{mf||а} мне участвовать в мятеже? Если я по твоим словам боюсь гибели, то ты ее явно ищешь!"

traits.locale_text: "Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really offer me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"

"Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really offer me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"

"Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really offer me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"

"Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really offer me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"

"Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really ask me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"

"Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really ask me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"

languages.text: “因为你的侮辱让我措手不及，你说服我加入叛军，就是为了转过头来就指责我犯下异端与叛国罪行吗？你说我怕死，可你这说的是什么话？难道你渴望死亡吗？”
languages.original_text: "Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really ask me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"

traits.locale_text: “因为你的侮辱让我措手不及，你让我加入叛军，就是为了转过头来就指责我犯下异端与叛国罪行吗？你说我怕死，可你这说的是什么话？难道你渴望死亡吗？”

languages.text: 「お前の暴言には不意を突かれた。反乱軍への参加を申し出たかと思いきや、突然異端と反逆罪で告発してくるとはな。本気なのか？私が死を恐れていると言ったが…お前が死への恐怖を刻み込んでいるだけだ！」
languages.original_text: "Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really ask me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の暴言には不意を突かれた。反乱軍への参加を申し出たかと思いきや、突然異端と反逆罪で告発してくるとはな。本気なのか？私が死を恐れていると言ったが…お前が死への恐怖を刻み込んでいるだけだ！」

languages.text: «Porque sus invectivas me pillaron por sorpresa. ¿En serio me pidió unirme a una rebelión para luego acusarme de herejía y traición? Dice que tengo miedo a la muerte... ¡Pues la ansía!».
languages.original_text: "Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really ask me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"

traits.locale_text: «Porque sus invectivas me pillaron por sorpresa. ¿En serio me ofreció unirme a una rebelión para luego acusarme de herejía y traición? Dice que tengo miedo a la muerte... ¡Pues la ansía!».

languages.text: "Weil Eure Beschimpfung mich überrumpelt hat. Habt Ihr mir wirklich gebeten, einer Rebellion beizutreten, und mich dann im nächsten Augenblick der Ketzerei und des Hochverrats bezichtigt? Ihr sagt, ich würde den Tod fürchten — nun, Ihr sehnt Euch nach ihm!"
languages.original_text: "Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really ask me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"

traits.locale_text: "Weil Eure Beschimpfung mich überrumpelt hat. Habt Ihr mir wirklich angeboten, einer Rebellion beizutreten, und mich dann im nächsten Augenblick der Ketzerei und des Hochverrats bezichtigt? Ihr sagt, ich würde den Tod fürchten — nun, Ihr sehnt Euch nach ihm!"

languages.text: « Parce que vos invectives m'ont pris au dépourvu. Comment pourrait-il en être autrement, alors que juste après m'avoir demandé de me joindre à une rébellion, vous m'accusez d'hérésie et de trahison ? Vous dites que j'ai peur de la mort, mais vous, vous avez plutôt l'air de l'appeler de vos vœux ! »
languages.original_text: "Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really ask me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"

traits.locale_text: « Parce que vos invectives m'ont pris au dépourvu. Comment pourrait-il en être autrement, alors que juste après m'avoir proposé de me joindre à une rébellion, vous m'accusez d'hérésie et de trahison ? Vous dites que j'ai peur de la mort, mais vous, vous avez plutôt l'air de l'appeler de vos vœux ! »

languages.text: "Çünkü hakaretin beni hazırlıksız yakaladı. Beni isyana katılmaya davet ediyor, sonra da fikir değiştirip beni kâfirlik ve hainlikle mi suçluyorsun gerçekten? Ölmekten korktuğumu söylüyorsun. Sen ise aranıyorsun!"
languages.original_text: "Because your invective caught me off guard. Did you really ask me to join a rebellion, then at once turn around and accuse me of heresy and treason? You say I am afraid of death — why, you positively crave it!"

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü hakaretin beni hazırlıksız yakaladı. Beni bir isyana katılmaya davet edip, sonra da fikir değiştirip beni kâfirlikle ve hainlikle mi suçluyorsun gerçekten? Benim ölmekten korktuğumu söylüyorsun. Sen ise aranıyorsun!"
